title: How to Turn a Worn out Broom Into a Floor Polisher

steps.headline: Tie a piece of felt or flannel cloth around the head of the worn-out broom.
steps.description: Use a rubber band or similar item to tie the cloth on the broom head.

steps.headline: Tip the broom over to check the cloth is sitting fast and firm.
Use the rejuvenated polishing broom on linoleum and wooden floors that need gentle polishing.
steps.description: This will make polishing a lot easier and you can keep washing the cloth to replace it rather than having to keep purchasing disposable equivalents on the market.
